page.title: 07 AFFLUENCE
page.content: Beaumont Park is a residential area situated near Whitley Bay and is 1.5km. from the North Sea.A survey was carried out to find the affluence of people living on the estate.We recorded the number of cars and television sets a family owned.We found 3% owned 0 cars, 49% owned 1 car,43% owned 2 cars and 5% owned 3 cars,giving us an average of 1.5.We also found 18% owned 1 T.V, 45% owned 2 T.V's,28% owned 3 T.V's,7% owned 4 T.V's and 2% owned 5 T.V's.This gave us an average of 2.3 T.V's per household.The results suggest that families who live on Beaumont Park are very affluent and most people owned a car probably because they worked out of the area and there was a lack of trans- port around Beaumont Park.
